description: This file defines data models and database operations for call history management in a Flutter application, including a data class 'CallHistoryEntry' and a storage class 'HistoryStore' that interacts with an SQLite database.

classes.name: CallHistoryEntry
classes.description: Data model representing an individual call history record, including fields for participants, start/end times, outcome, and methods for mapping to/from database representations.

classes.name: HistoryStore
classes.description: A class responsible for managing the SQLite database connection and providing methods to insert, update, and retrieve call history entries.

methods.name: _open
methods.description: Lazy initializer to open and cache the database connection.

methods.name: insert
methods.description: Inserts a new CallHistoryEntry into the database.

methods.name: updateEnd
methods.description: Updates the end time and outcome of a call history record by ID.

methods.name: all
methods.description: Retrieves all call history entries ordered by start time descending.
